text: ۞إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ وَنُوحٗا وَءَالَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَءَالَ عِمۡرَٰنَ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

translation.en: Indeed, Allah chose Adam and Noah and the family of Abraham and the family of 'Imran over the worlds
translation.id: Sesungguhnya Allah telah memilih Adam, Nuh, keluarga Ibrahim dan keluarga Imran melebihi segala umat (pada masa masing-masing)
